nodes.text: Gnasps were wasp-like insects native to the moon of Alaris in the Kashyyyk system, Alaris Prime. They were very large creatures that nested in giant underground holes and would attack in swarms. Gnasps had fang-like teeth and large stingers.
Anakin Skywalker and Bera Kazan encountered these creatures during their time on the Wookiee-dominated moon, shortly before the battle of Alaris Prime.
The fluttercraft used as patrol vehicles on Kashyyyk were named after these creatures.
